divs: Sighting Details At approx. 2030hrs I was standing outside my downstairs door letting my dog out. I looked up into the clear night sky and all of a sudden I saw this huge sphere speed by me from west to east. In the amount of time it takes an airliner to travel this distance (appror.50-60sec.) this ufo did it in 4 to 5 seconds and then it just blinked out. The object flew in a straight line toward the nevada desert,and area 51.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Gardnerville
There were no other sightings in Gardnerville on or around October 15th 2009
Summary: A round sphere, that was white with orange tint.
